action.primary: Dispels Wind-Dampness and unblocks the channels

indications: Wind-Cold-Damp Bi with stiff joints, lower back pain, sore knees and cramping of muscles and sinews

useCases: Pain, impaired joint movement and spasms of the sinews due to Wind-Damp Bi.
Wind-Damp-Bi causing pain, spasms and numbness.

notes: Some sources say that his herb is contraindicated during pregnancy.
Other sources say that this herb calms the fetus during pregnancy.

Both Hai Feng Teng and Caulis Trachelospermi #{LuoShiTeng} Luo Shi Teng dispel Wind and promote the flow of Qi in the collaterals and are often used to treat restricted joint movement due to Wind-Dampness, cramps and spasms. Hai Feng Teng is slightly warm and a better choice when these disorders are not associated with Heat. Luo Shi Teng is cooling and preferred when Heat is a factor. It also cools the Blood and reduces swellings and is used for swollen, toxic sores and trauma leading to swelling and hematoma.
